name: A Snowcat's Secret
description:
Every winter, cats made of snow awake to roam the world, telling stories and secrets to all who will hear. As one such frosty cat yourself, you take great pride in keeping your friends' secrets year after year. Can you continue? Secrets take the form of a rhythmic pattern of meows. If you jump, move, roll snowballs, touch hollynip or perform some other action you will meow and risk spilling the beans! How far can you travel with your lips sealed?

This game supports mouse+keyboard and gamepads. Space key or the A button jump and navigate menus. WASD keys, arrow keys, or the left analog stick move your character.

Thanks for playing! Contact me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
